title: Defiant Heir
description: The man of my dreams is nothing short of perfect. Kao Reed is a hermit who loves to live in the shadows.With striking blue eyes and a gentle nature, he won my heart years ago. Iâ€™ve woven all my dreams and future around him.But then the worst happens.My dreams crumble to dust, and my future becomes a bleak wasteland.And the man I love with all my heart becomes a stranger in the blink of an eye.My blind love, my blind love,See how he fights, see how he fights,He lost his sight, he lost his will,He became defiant; he became heartless.Did you ever see such a thing in your life,As my blind love?
author: Michelle Heard
